item.title: SIXTH NOUN: LOCATIVE/PREPOSITIONAL
item.description: Here (only) about usage; conjugations in a subsequent section, though you will inevitably encounter them below. Location The main use of the sixth noun is to designate a place - the name “locative” already indicates it, most other uses flow from it.
